typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		ShipDate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		UpdatedDate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
